text: Jwannume jwachikululu jwangalombela ikaweje jwankongwe jwachigwagwa (n’jakwe) kapena jwakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nombenajo jwankongwe jwachigwagwa jwangalombedwa ikaweje ni jwannume jwachikululu (n’jakwe) kapena jwakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), ni iwele haraam yalakweyo kwa wakulupilila
